OverviewÂ¶

Module bhp_off_study manages taking a subject off study. Data may not be collected on a date after the date the subject is taken off study. However, existing data should be editable even after a subject is taken off study. Additionally, an off study report should be rejected if the date subject taken off study is before the report date of existing data.

Module bhp_off_study makes use of a mixin bhp_off_study.mixins.OffStudyMixin. The mixin has methods that help a save method determine the study status of a subject and whether or not to allow the data to be saved.

All local models that require consent should have access to the mixin methods since the methods are referred to by bhp_consent at the save level.
